page.title: 12WAREHOUSING IN MOORE
page.content: {Dupont's Acton Grange Distribution {Centre.}Storage space of 224,000 sq ft This was set up in Moore because on Manchester Ship Canal and most of product came from works at Londonderry N.Ireland.That factory closed down, canal no longer used but warehouse at centre of motorway system.Goods stored include synthetic rubber,plastics weed killers,paint plus lots of others. Deals with 50000 tons a year-30000 orders.Employs 50 people,18 manual in warehouse,rest office staff with soph isticated computer system. {American Can(UK)Acton Grange.}Leased from Duponts.Can store 80million empty cans which are made in nearby Runcorn Factory.Storage space of 130,000 sq ft. All loading and unloading of cans done under cover to protect cans in any weather conditions.Cans are already in drink firms colours.
